snippet: As Ohio State prepares to play Rutgers for the first time Saturday, a small informal poll shows some Buckeye fans know little about the Scarlet Knights or where they come from.
abstract: Harvey Araton On College Football column observes that Rutgers is preparing to play Ohio State for the first time since becoming a part of the Big Ten conference; notes informal poll showing that many Ohio fans know very little about the Scarlet Knights and their history.
lead_paragraph: As Ohio State prepares to play Rutgers for the first time Saturday, a small informal poll shows some Buckeye fans know little about the Scarlet Knights or where they come from.

headline.seo: Ohio State Fans Take an Informal Rutgers Pop Quiz
headline.main: Scarlet Knights? Buckeyes Ponder a New Big Ten
headline.print_headline: Scarlet Knights? Buckeyes Ponder a New Big Ten

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
